channel.title: Dragon claws special [delta]
channel.description:
my delta has dragon claws that hit 4times when spec but some reason everytime you spec it show 3zeros when i spec npc's (not rly big deal thought since its npcs). but when use on players its rly weird.. it will show 4 hits and they wont even be correct hits like supose to.. (ex: 24 12 6 3 like on rs). I dubble logged in to test and instead oh being like rs and cut each # in half it shows 4 random #s (ex: 18 22 22 11 is what i hit last time) but the even more confusing part was i looked at other account i atted and his hp only when down but 26..? its weird. Can anybody please help me?
P.s. somthing is also rly wierd bout my gmaul stance: i stand straight with arms down by side and feet together holding the gmaul straight out horizantaly. and when i attack it shows hits and spec even works but me nor the maul will even move..? ):
